summary: OIL LEAKING JUST BELOW DIPSTICK. NOT FROM THE DIPSTICK ITSELF BUT FROM A HORIZONTAL CREASE BELOW IT. OIL LEAKED ONTO HEAT SHIELD AND DOWN ONTO EXHAUST. BURNING SMELL COMES THROUGH AIR VENTS MAKING IT HARD TO BREATHE IN CAB. NOTICED THIS AFTER DRIVING ON THE INTERSTATE AND MINOR CITY TRAFFIC.
